---
title: "Week 1 Homework"
output: html_notebook
---

Generate matrix 

```{r}
set.seed(123)

toy_matrix <- matrix(rnbinom(n=50, 1, p=0.01), nrow=5, ncol=10)

#label matrix 

colnames(toy_matrix) <- c("cond1", "cond2", "cond3", "cond4", "cond5", "ctrl1", 
                          "ctrl2", "ctrl3", "ctrl4", "ctrl5")

rownames(toy_matrix) <- c("gene1", "gene2", "gene3", "gene4", "gene5")

toy_matrix
```

Generate Fold Change

```{r}
cond_mean <- rowMeans(toy_matrix[, 1:5])
ctrl_mean <- rowMeans(toy_matrix[, 6:10])

fold_change <- cond_mean / ctrl_mean

fold_change <- unname(fold_change) #keep them unlabelled

results <- data.frame(gene =  c("gene1", "gene2", "gene3", "gene4", "gene5"), 
                      fold_change = fold_change)

results 
```
